title: I lost my promo series but i only lost two games
body: I failed my promotion series into gold 5 but i only lost 2 games. I didn't dodge but i failed my series I don't know why.

replies.body: Losing your promo into Gold after 2 losses sounds weird, so I took a look into this for you.  Unless my resources haven't updated, I see you have 2 losses and your series isn't over yet.  I don't see any queue doges either.  You should still be going through your series, so it's strange if you received a failed notification.  My advise would be to just keep going, you're still in this!
My profile says I have 68 LP and that I'm no longer in a series. It didn't give me a notification.
Yup!  To clarify, you still lose and gain LP during your series.  You lost 2 games in your series so far which brought you down to 68 LP.  Hope that clears things up, but let me know.
Thank you for the assistance with this. I appreciate it.
Update: I played two more games and it worked. I Finally got up into gold. Thanks again {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} for the help with this issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Jens11,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0EqMtTnn,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-03-31T21:38:29.085+0000)
>
> I failed my promotion series into gold 5 but i only lost 2 games. I didn&#039;t dodge but i failed my series I don&#039;t know why.

I was just in my game #4 of my promos into gold 5. I only have 2 games lost in my match history under "Ranked Solo/Duo" and it said i lost the series. Can you please clarify this for me?

I checked my profile page after the second loss of my promo series and it no longer said I was in my promo series but instead said 68 LP. But the situation has been resolved and it was just an error on my profile page I believe. I just played the next game and it was fine.
